patthana21.48:1.1_0: Naāsavasampayuttaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana21.48:2.1_0: Naāsavavippayuttaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana21.48:4.1_0: Naāsavasampayuttaṁ naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
